PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14932018-11-29,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectPacific Pilotage Authority's borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (1) Repealing paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 2006-176 of March 30, 2006; and, (2) Fixing the maximum amount of money that can be borrowed at any time by the PACIFIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY, in Canada or elsewhere for the purpose of defraying its expenses at CDN $11,900,000.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
